resources.string: O módulo não está ativado. Por favor ative o módulo e tente novamente
Ocultar ícone da área de trabalho
Tem certeza que deseja reiniciar o sistema?
Tem certeza de que deseja reiniciar o aplicativo escola?
Requer a reinicialização para ter efeito
Sempre usar a assinatura do aplicativo instalado ao instalar
Não é comum perigoso, Habilitar apenas quando absolutamente necessário
Desativar verificação de assinatura do gerenciador de pacotes
Desative a verificação de assinatura ao instalar o aplicativo, você pode instalar o aplicativo adulterado
Desativar verificação da assinatura do aplicativo
Permite substituir aplicativos com assinaturas diferentes do mesmo nome de pacote
Permitir o downgrade e instalação de apps
Permite que o aplicativo substitua diretamente a instalação da versão antiga ao instalar a nova versão
Pode resolver a verificação de integridade em alguns aplicativos, geralmente não precisa ser ativado
A ampliação do papel de parede quando o botão de área de trabalho do sistema é aplicado
Faz com que a maioria dos aplicativos suporte a uma pequena janela de abertura, precisa verificar o launcher do sistema e a SystemUI ao mesmo tempo
Remover restrições de acesso do usuário
Permitir captura de tela de todas as interfaces
Precisa verificar a Galeria e Captura de Tela ao mesmo tempo
Defina a velocidade de animação em diferentes cenários separadamente
Velocidade de animação de transição \"Quando o aplicativo é ativado ou desativado\".
A velocidade da animação de transição que entra em vigor quando o aplicativo é aberto e encerrado
Transition animation speed「In and out of the background」
The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when entering and exiting the most recent task
Double-click to turn off the screen
Double-click the blank space on the desktop to turn off the screen.
Remove the \"All\" tab of the application group in the drawer
Remove the \"Edit\" button in the drawer to apply paging
It will be recognized as high-end by default. Remove some logs at the same time.
Modify the animation effect of the horizontal recent task removal card
This will disable the effect that the wallpaper will gradually brighten from dimming when going in and out of the recent task
The application name that is too long will be scrolled and displayed without any new line
Press and hold the desktop icon to add a quick open window
Change the large round corner 2x1&1x2 icon designed by MIUI brain pumping to normal small round corner
Optimize the transition effect from lock screen to desktop when unlocking
Show Real Use and Total Memory
Continuing right swipe from the last page will take you back to the first page
Do not remove the status bar clock when there is any clock widget on the launcher
Set the size of task view cards in different styles
It is still a semi-finished product, and the effect triggered in the folder has been optimized
Use the official half-finished complete blur feature
Complements blur when swiping up from the App, which may cause visual flicker
Used in conjunction with minus one screen blur, and the system launcher need to be checked
Unlock in no word mode still has issues
Third-party themes and fonts are allowed to be applied, and the system framework need to be checked and restarted at the same time.
Guess the ads in your favorite will be displayed as blank cards, and the ads in the rest will be completely removed
Remove the icon and camera function in the lower right corner of the lock screen interface
Remove the lock screen minus one screen
Remove the icon at the lower left corner of the lock screen and the negative screen function
Instantaneous current is displayed at the bottom of the lock screen during charging
Time in seconds on Status bar
The time of the position of the status bar is displayed in seconds, excluding the notification bar and the control center
Disable MIUI copying Apple\'s temporarily disable Bluetooth
Force to use new HD icon
A recent system version is required, some models may not have been updated
Use Mix Alpha charge animation instead of default charge animation
WIFI icon shows the Wi-Fi protocol
Charging display only, refresh rate is determined by the system
Time in seconds on Lock screen
The time of the position of the lock screen is displayed in seconds
Disable dynamic refresh rate to achieve global high frame rate except for camera
The specific temperature is displayed on the current temperature of the battery page of power saving and battery
Skip the waiting confirmation countdown time of most dangerous options

-Only VAB models are supported. Please do not turn on other models 
-No internal test qualification is required to brush into the complete internal test package 
-Users with permissions will not be able to receive updates and can also be used to mask updates 
-Only used by the official system
Show notification importance settings which are hidden in MIUI
MediaTek devices are only recommended to be enabled on Android 13, non-Android 13 MediaTek devices often have a black screen when dynamically adjusting the blur radius
Disable the app installation\'s count checking
The module is fine, please do not reset it at will
Do you want to reset the module?
